snippet.title: Puyo Puyo (ぷよぷよ), MSX (1991) Mission 1-10 Gameplay
snippet.description:
What, you thought the arcade was the first entry? Wrong, it's the MSX version and I can see why most people overlooked the game.

I'm still working on my comparison video, check on my Twitter for updates. In the meantime, I'll upload gameplay footage from lesser known games to curb the gap between uploads.

The game is translated thanks to msx.org. Recorded from an fMSX emulator via Bandicam. It has an unusual screen resolution for this channel, 1280 x 960, making it the first. It's also the first, real MSX gameplay footage to be uploaded on this channel.


Don't forget to like, comment & share!

Social Media:

Ask for PSN ID, Discord (MOST ACTIVE)

Twitter https://www.twitter.com/trevgauntlet (MOST ACTIVE)

DeviantArt: http://trevgauntlet.deviantart.com/

Steam: steamcommunity.com/id/Trevgauntlet

Like what you guys see and would consider supporting my channel? Please donate to my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=5817027
